trans-unit.source: Defines constants that indicate how a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref> is displayed.

This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> types to indicate the appearance of the cell when it is not in edit mode.
In edit mode, the cell displays the hosted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control.
When it is not in edit mode, the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref> mimics the appearance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref> control.

When it is not in edit mode, the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref> is displayed with a drop-down button but does not otherwise mimic the appearance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref> control.
When it is not in edit mode, the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref> is displayed without a drop-down button.
